control.label: Corporate governance and ownership concentration in the Czech Republic
control.creator: super:STRUNCOV

md.name: descriptive
md.value: <record xmlns="http://www.loc.gov/MARC21/slim" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.loc.gov/MARC21/slim http://www.loc.gov/standards/marcxml/schema/MARC21slim.xsd"><leader>01938nam^a22003257a^4500</leader><controlfield tag="FMT">BK</controlfield><controlfield tag="001">fsv293655</controlfield><controlfield tag="003">CZ PrCU</controlfield><controlfield tag="005">20090319131025.0</controlfield><controlfield tag="008">050509s2005^^^^xr^|||||r|||||||||||eng|d</controlfield><datafield tag="040" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">ABD103</subfield><subfield code="b">cze</subfield><subfield code="c">ABD103</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="100" ind1="1" ind2=" "><subfield code="a">Mejstřík, Kryštof</subfield><subfield code="4">aut</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="245" ind1="1" ind2="0"><subfield code="a">Corporate governance and ownership concentration in the Czech Republic /</subfield><subfield code="c">Kryštof Mejstřík ; konzultant Ondřej Schneider</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="260" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">Praha,</subfield><subfield code="c">2005</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="300" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">88 listů :</subfield><subfield code="b">il.</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="500" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">Dodatky na listě 87-88</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="502" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">Rigorózní práce (PhDr.)--Univerzita Karlova. Fakulta sociálních věd. Institut ekonomických studií, 2005</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="504" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">Bibliografie na listě 80-86</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="520" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">This thesis deals with issues of corporate governance and ownership concentration in the Czech Republic. First, the developments of the 1990s are reviewed and the role of privatization and institutional framework in these developments is scrutinized. Then, the current situation in the Czech corporate sector (among companies listed on the Prague Stock Exchange in particular) is examined. Hungary is used as a comparison to the Czech Republic.</subfield><subfield code="9">eng</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="520" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">Tato rigorózní práce se zabývá otázkami corporate governance a koncentrace vlastnictví v České republice. Nejprve je nastíněn vývoj během devadesátých letech a role privatizace a institucionálního prostředí v tomto procesu. Poté je blíže zkoumána současná situace v korporátním sektoru, a to zejména společností kótovanýh na Burze cenných papírů v Praze. Práce porovnáná situaci v České republice se situací v Maďarsku.</subfield><subfield code="9">cze</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="650" ind1="0" ind2="7"><subfield code="a">Práce rigorózní</subfield><subfield code="2">fsv</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="650" ind1="0" ind2="7"><subfield code="a">privatizace</subfield><subfield code="2">czenas</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="651" ind1=" " ind2="7"><subfield code="a">Česko</subfield><subfield code="2">czenas</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="651" ind1=" " ind2="7"><subfield code="a">Maďarsko</subfield><subfield code="2">czenas</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="655" ind1=" " ind2="4"><subfield code="a">rigorózní práce</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="700" ind1="1" ind2=" "><subfield code="a">Schneider, Ondřej,</subfield><subfield code="d">1964-</subfield><subfield code="7">mzk2003190828</subfield><subfield code="4">oth</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="710" ind1="2" ind2=" "><subfield code="a">Univerzita Karlova.</subfield><subfield code="b">Institut ekonomických studií</subfield><subfield code="7">xx0005480</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="980" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">application.pdf</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="981" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">rg</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="910" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">ABD103</subfield></datafield><controlfield tag="998">000293655</controlfield><datafield tag="SID" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">Z39</subfield><subfield code="b">CKS01</subfield></datafield></record>
